sentences: Paljude inimeste pilgud pöörduvad sellele majale.
Ta vaatas, seiras mind pika pilguga.
context: The Estonian word 'pilk' primarily refers to a look or gaze that one person gives to another. It can describe both sustained visual attention and quick glances, as well as the general way of seeing things or perspective. The word encompasses various types of looks - friendly ones, angry ones, curious ones, etc., depending on the context.
